title: Shikanoko Nokonoko Koshitantan
description:
Koshi Torako is a top-level high school student, adored by classmates and recognized by society. 
However, under a carefully crafted honor-student mask hides a legendary delinquent. 
Good thing for Torako that it's in the past and no one can possibly recognize her now...or so she thought, until one day she meets an unknown creature named Shikanoko Noko (or just Nokotan for friends)! 
It's unclear what Nokotan is—a human girl or an elk—but in an instant she was able to see (or sniff) through Torako's game. 
And now it seems she is set to drive Torako crazy! Expect much hilarity in the process.

[U]Fun Fact[/U] :
-Author is the illustrator for Vtuber [url=https://m.youtube.com/channel/UCZlDXzGoo7d44bwdNObFacg]天音かなた[/url] 
-Because of that, Physical copies on Amazon store soldout on the 1st day

matches.title: Riko to Haru to Onsen to Iruka
A Girl Who Can't Speak Thinks "She Is Too Kind."
Robot Izonkei Joshi no Meiwaku na Nichijou
